direction.raw_text: I'm telling you you're messing up the story, now get it right!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you want me to go on with this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right, then. No more interruptions. (starts to read again) ... at noon, she met her subjects again. This time as their Queen. And on these words--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . PRINCE HUMPERDINCK HUMPERDINCK My father's final words were "love her as I loved her, and there will be joy." I present to you your Queen. Queen Buttercup. And on his words--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why do you do this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because you had love in your hands, and you gave it up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (distraught) But they would have killed Westley if I hadn't done it. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your true love lives and you marry another -- (to the crowd)
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: : THE KID'S ROOM The Kid is half sitting now, not strong yet, but clearly stronger than when we first saw him.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : THE CROWD and it's gigantic.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : THE ARCHWAY we saw before, as Buttercup emerges.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : THE CROWD suddenly going to its knees, wave after wave of silent KNEELING PEOPLE. All of them down.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : BUTTERCUP touched as before, but then she seems stunned as we
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : THE CROWD SOMEONE IS BOOING! The BOOING gets louder as an ANCIENT WOMAN approaches Buttercup through the crowd, BOOING every step of the way.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: True love saved her in the Fire Swamp, and she treated it like garbage. And that's what she is, the Queen of Refuse! So, bow down to her if you want. Bow to her. Bow to the Queen of Slime, the Queen of Filth, the Queen of Putrescence. Boo! Boo! Rubbish! Filth! Slime! Muck! Boo! Boo! She advances on Buttercup now, who is more and more panicked. CLOSE-UP - THE ANCIENT BOOER Louder and louder and LOUDER she shrieks vituperation at Buttercup, reaching out her old hands toward Buttercup's throat, and Buttercup is as frightened now as Dorothy was when the Witch went after her in "The Wizard of Oz", and suddenly,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (off-screen, still reading) It was ten days till the wedding. The King still lived, but Buttercup's nightmares were growing steadily worse.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (off-screen) See? Didn't I tell you she'd never marry that rotten Humperdinck?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (off-screen)
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: : BUTTERCUP coming out of her nightmare, alone in her castle bedroom. As she frantically grabs a robe and starts to run.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: yes, you're very smart. Shut-Up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It comes to this: I love Westley. I always have. I know now I always will. If you tell me I must marry you in ten days, please believe I will be dead by morning.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I could never cause you grief; consider our wedding off. (to Rugen) You returned this Westley to his ship?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then we will simply alert him. (to Buttercup now) Beloved, are you certain he still wants you? After all, it was you who did the leaving in the Fire Swamp. Not to mention that pirates are not known to be men of their words.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My Westley will always come for me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I suggest a deal. You write four copies of a letter. I'll send my four fastest ships. One in each direction. The Dread Pirate Roberts is always close to Florin this time of year. We'll run up the white flag and deliver your message. If Westley wants you, bless you both. If not ... please consider me as an alternative to suicide. Are we agreed? And she nods -- CUT TO: ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . A VERY THICK GROVE OF TREES The trees are unusual in one respect: all of them are extraordinarily heavily knotted. PULL BACK TO REVEAL Humperdinck and Rugen, walking into the grove of trees.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your Princess is really a winning creature. A trifle simple, perhaps, but her appeal is undeniable.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, I know. The people are quite taken with her. It's odd, but when I hired Vizzini to have her murdered on our engagement day, I thought that was clever. But it's going to be so much more moving when I strangle her on our wedding night. Once Guilder is blamed, the nation will be truly outraged. They'll demand we go to war. They are deeper into the grove now. Rugen is searching around.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now, where is that secret knot? It's impossible to find. (Finding the knot on the tree he hits it, and it opens, revealing a staircase leading underground.) Are you coming down into the Pit? Westley's got his strength back. I am starting him on The Machine tonight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tyrone, you know how much I love watching you work. But, I've got my country's five hundredth anniversary to plan, my wedding to arrange, My wife to murder, and Guilder to frame for it. I'm swamped. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get some rest -- if you haven't got your health, you haven't got anything. Rugen smiles and hurries down the stairs as the tree slides back perfectly into place.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Beautiful, isn't it? The Albino starts attaching suction cups to Westley.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It took me half a lifetime to invent it. I'm sure you've discovered my deep and abiding interest in pain. At present I'm writing the definitive work on the subject. So I want you to be totally honest with me on how The Machine makes you feel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This being our first try, I'll use the lowest setting. And he turns the dial to "1".
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . WESTLEY He has suction cups on his head now, on his temple, on his heart, his hands and feet. He says nothing, keeps control of himself
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As you know, the concept of the suction pump is centuries old. Well, really, that's all this is. Except that instead of sucking water, I'm sucking life. I've just sucked one year of your life away. I might one day go as high as five, but I really don't know what that would do to you. So, let's just start with what we have. What did this do to you? Tell me. And remember, this is for posterity, so be honest -- how do you feel? AND NOW, AT LAST:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . WESTLEY in anguish so deep it is dizzying. Helpless, he cries. Count Rugen watches the tears, then starts to write.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Interesting.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yellin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (bows, then kneels) Sire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As Chief Enforcer of all Florin, I trust you with this secret: killers from Guilder are infiltrating the Thieves' Forest and plan to murder my bride on our wedding night.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My spy network has heard no such news.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Any word from Westley?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He will come for me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of course. As she glides out--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She will not be murdered. On the day of the wedding, I want the Thieves' Forest emptied and every inhabitant arrested.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Many of the thieves will resist. My regular enforcers will be inadequate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Form a Brute Squad then. I want the Thieves' Forest emptied before I wed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It won't be easy, Sire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (alone, exhausted) Try ruling the world sometime.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (off-screen) The day of the wedding arrived. The Brute Squad had their hands full carrying out Humperdinck's orders.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to an unpleasantlooking assistant) Is everybody out?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, you give him some trouble. Move! And his wagon starts, and as it does,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I am waiting for you, Vizzini. You told me to go back to the beginning. So I have. This is where I am, and this is where I'll stay. I will not be moved. He takes a long pull from his brandy bottle. He stops as the Assistant Brute comes into view.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ho there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I do not budge. Keep your "Ho there." He waves his sword dangerously.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But the Prince gave orders -- INIGO -- So did Vizzini -- when a job went wrong, you went back to the beginning. And this is where we got the job. So it's the beginning, and I'm staying till Vizzini comes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (gesturing off-screen) You! Brute! Come here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (off-screen) You surely are a meanie. INIGO feels a hand on his back. A huge hand. He compares it to his own smaller hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: True! And as the Assistant Brute is just about to club Inigo's brains out, FEZZIK lets fly with a stupendous punch. The Assistant Brute takes the full force of the blow right in the chops. It's like he was shot from a cannon as he careens backwards out of sight across the street. There is a pause. Then a crunching sound, as he clearly has come in contact with something hard and immobile. FEZZIK puts Inigo down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't look so good. (after Inigo blasts air in protest) You don't smell so good either.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Perhaps not. I feel fine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah? And so FEZZIK puts Inigo down. That's when Inigo faints, and as he does,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (off-screen)
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: : BUTTERCUP bursting into the Prince's chambers. Count Rugen stands nearby. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : PRINCE HUMPERDINCK Just stunned. Finally, softly, he begins to talk.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : AN ENORMOUS THING We can't tell quite what it is or what it does, but somehow it is unsettling. PULL BACK TO REVEAL Count Rugen, dragging Westley up alongside the thing -- Levers and wheels and wires, you name it, it's there.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : A DIAL with numbers ranging from a low of "1" to a high of "50." Rugen goes to it.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : COUNT RUGEN fiddling with his Machine a moment more. And then he opens the flood gate, water pours down the chute, turning the wheel, which in turn really gets The Machine going.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : WESTLEY and he's lying on the table, and he's only flesh and the chains are metal and thick, but such is his desperation it almost seems he might break them. A terrible sound comes from his throat, an incessant gasping. It keeps on coming as we finally
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : COUNT RUGEN He switches off The Machine, picks up a large notebook and pen, sits in a chair. The NOISE of The Machine subsides. Rugen opens the book to a blank page.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : HUMPERDINCK in his quarters, swamped. Piles of papers are strewn all over. Now YELLIN, a pale, shifty, quick-eyed man appears in the doorway.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : BUTTERCUP entering.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : THE PRINCE AND YELLIN turning to her in the doorway.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : THE THIEVES' FOREST - DAY A lot of hollering is going on. The THIEVES are being rounded up by the BRUTE SQUAD, a large group of large men. Yellin stands on a wagon in the midst of all the scuffling.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INIGO drunk as a skunk, sprawled in front of a hovel, a bottle of brandy in one hand, the six-fingered sword in the other. He looks dreadful. Unshaven, puffy-eyed, gaunt. But the way he brandishes the great sword in front of him would give anyone cause for worry.
dialogue.name: dialogue

result.ToD: EMPTY ALEHOUSE IN THE THIEVES' QUARTER
result.heading: EMPTY ALEHOUSE IN THE THIEVES' QUARTER

dialogue.raw_text: : AN EMPTY ALEHOUSE IN THE THIEVES' QUARTER Inigo sits slumped in a chair, while FEZZIK spoons him some stew. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: and Inigo were reunited. And as FEZZIK nursed his inebriated friend back to health, he told Inigo of Vizzini's death and the existence of Count Rugen, the sixfingered man. Considering Inigo's lifelong search, he handled the news surprisingly well. And he faints again into his stew.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (off-screen) Fezzik took great care in reviving Inigo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (up and going) That's enough. That's enough! Where is this Rugen so I may kill him?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's with the Prince in the Castle. But the castle gate is guarded by thirty men.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How many could you handle?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't think more than ten.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (doing the math on his fingers) That leaves twenty for me. At my best, I could never defeat that many. (he sinks sadly down) I need Vizzini to plan. I have no gift for strategy. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But Vizzini's dead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No -- not Vizzini -- I need the Man in Black -- FEZZIK -- what? -- INIGO -- look, he bested you with strength, your greatness. He bested me with steel. He must have outthought Vizzini, and a man who can do that can plan my castle's onslaught any day. Let's go -- FEZZIK -- where?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To find the Man in Black, obviously.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But you don't know where he is.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (he is possessed by demons now) Don't bother me with trifles; after twenty years, at last, my father's soul will be at peace.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (big) There will be blood tonight!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . PRINCE HUMPERDINCK'S CHAMBERS -- strewn with maps, etc. Yellin enters, and kneels.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (sharpening his dagger) Rise and report.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Thieves' Forest is emptied. Thirty men guard the castle gate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Double it. My Princess must be safe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The gate has but one key, and I carry that. He shows the key, dangling from a chain around his neck. Just at that moment, Buttercup enters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah! My dulcet darling. Tonight we marry. Tomorrow morning, your men will escort us to Florin Channel where every ship in my armada waits to accompany us on our honeymoon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Every ship but your four fastest, you mean. The Prince looks at her blankly for a moment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Every ship but the four you sent.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. Yes, of course. Naturally, not those four.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (bows, exits) Your Majesties.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You never sent the ships. Don't bother lying. It doesn't matter. Westley will come for me anyway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (sharply) You're a silly girl.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, I am a silly girl, for not having seen sooner that you were nothing but a coward with a heart full of fear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (close to erupting; speaks very distinctly) I-would-not-say-such things-if- Iwere-you-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why not? You can't hurt me. Westley and I are joined by the bonds of love. And you cannot track that. Not with a thousand bloodhounds. And you cannot break it. Not with a thousand swords. And when I say you are a coward, that is only because you are the slimiest weakling ever to crawl the earth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . WESTLEY IN THE MACHINE but it's not on. Count Rugen is adding more notes to his book. He looks up as the Prince suddenly comes down the steps, raging.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (at Westley) You truly love each other, and so you might have been truly happy. Not one couple in a century has that chance, no matter what the storybooks say. And so I think no man in a century will suffer as greatly as you will. And with that he whirls, turns on The Machine, grabs the lever and -- CUT TO: COUNT RUGEN calling out -- RUGEN Not to fifty!!! But it's too late as we -- CUT TO: PRINCE HUMPERDINCK shoving the lever all the way up and
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . YELLIN AND HIS SIXTY BRUTES and they bear it, and a few of the Brutes turn to each other in fear, and as the scream builds -- CUT TO: BUTTERCUP IN HER ROOM and she hears the SOUND, doesn't know what it is, but her arms involuntarily go around her body to try to control the trembling, and the scream, still builds and -- CUT TO: ESTABLISHING SHOT ACROSS THE RIVER There are many PEOPLE --it is the day of the country's 500th Anniversary -- but all the People stop as the sound hits them. A few CHILDREN pale, bolt toward their PARENTS and -- CUT TO: INIGO AND FEZZIK trying to make their way through the jammed marketplace, which suddenly quiets as the fading sound comes through.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (instantly) FEZZIK, FEZZIK, listen, do you hear? -- That is the sound of ultimate suffering. My heart made that sound when Rugen slaughtered my father. The Man in Black makes it now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Man in Black?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: His true love is marrying another tonight, so who else has cause for Ultimate Suffering? (trying to push through) Excuse me -- It's too crowded.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: pardon me, it's important -- No one budges and the sound is fading faster. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fezzik, please -- FEZZIK (gigantic and roaring) Everybody ... MOVE!! And the Crowd begins to fall away, and he and Inigo start to track the FADING SOUND.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where is the Man in Black? The Albino shakes his head, says nothing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You get there from this grove, yes? Silence.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fezzik, jog his memory. And Fezzik crunches the Albino on the top of the head as if he had a hammer and was driving in a nail. The Albino drops without a sound.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (upset) I'm sorry, Inigo. I didn't mean to jog him so hard. Inigo?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Father, I have failed you for twenty years. Now our misery can end. Somewhere ... somewhere close by is a man who can help us. I cannot find him alone. I need you. I need you to guide my sword. Please. And now he rises, eyes still closed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Guide my sword.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's dead. Inigo is in despair. For a moment, he just sags.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (barely able to speak) It just is not fair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (off-screen)
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: : TWO LARGE TUBS one filled with steaming water, the other with water clearly of an icy nature. Without a word FEZZIK stuffs Inigo's head into the icy water, then, after a reasonable amount of time, pulls him out, ducks him into the steaming stuff, and, a short time after that, puts him back in the cold again, then back in the hot -- GRANDFATHER
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : THE TWO OF THEM Silent and bereft. Then a wild look hits Inigo.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : CLOSE UP - INIGO INIGO
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : HUMPERDINCK jumping at her, yanking her by the hair, starting to pull her along, out of control, his words indistinct.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : A CORRIDOR OF THE CASTLE as the Prince throws open the door to Buttercup's room, slams it shut, locks it, breaks into a wild run and -- CUT TO: ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : WESTLEY'S FACE And there has never been such pain. The pain grows and grows and with it now, something else has started THE DEATH SCREAM. As The Death Scream starts to rise -- CUT TO: OUTSIDE THE PIT OF DESPAIR as the SOUND moves along, LOUDER AND LOUDER, and -- CUT TO: ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
dialogue.name: dialogue

result.heading: GROVE OF TREES NEAR THE PIT OF DESPAIR

dialogue.raw_text: : A GROVE OF TREES NEAR THE PIT OF DESPAIR The Albino appears wheeling a barrow. Inigo's sword pushes at his chest.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INIGO He kneels, the sword held tight between his hands. Eyes closed, he faces the grove of trees, starts to talk, his voice low and strange. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : THE GROVE OF TREES as Inigo, eyes shut tight, walks forward, the great sword held in his hands. Fezzik, frightened, follows close behind.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : THE SECRET KNOT that reveals the staircase.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INIGO walking blind through the grove of trees. He moves to the Secret Knot, hesitates, then moves past it. Then Inigo stops. For a long moment he stands frozen. Suddenly he whirls, eyes still closed, and the sword strikes home dead center into a knot and -- Nothing. He has failed. In utter despair he collapses against the tree. Against a knot in the tree. Against THE KNOT in the tree. It slides away, revealing the staircase. FEZZIK and Inigo look at each other, then start down.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : WESTLEY dead by The Machine. FEZZIK leans over him, listening for a heartbeat. Then he looks at Inigo, shakes his head. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Grandpa, Grandpa -- wait -- CUT TO: THE KID'S ROOM He is terribly excited and looks stronger than we've yet seen him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: wait -- what did FEZZIK mean, "He's dead?" I mean he didn't mean dead. The Grandfather says nothing, just sits there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Westley's only faking, right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You want me to read this or not?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who gets Humperdinck?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't understand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who kills Prince Humperdinck? At the end, somebody's got to do it. Is it Inigo? Who?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You mean he wins? Jesus, Grandpa! What did you read me this thing for? And he desperately fights for control.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know, you've been very sick and you're taking this story very seriously. I think we better stop now. He closes the book and starts to get up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (shaking his head) No! I'm okay. I'm okay. (gestures toward the chair)
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: : THE KID: CLOSE UP
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: sit down. All right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay. (sitting and opening the book again) All right, now, let's see. Where were we? Oh yes. In the Pit of Despair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, we Montoyas have never taken defeat easily. Come along, Fezzik. Bring the body.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The body?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (not stopping) Have you any money?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have a little.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . As Fezzik takes the corpse, follows Inigo up the stairs -- CUT TO: A HOVEL - DUSK Inigo, FEZZIK, Westley approach the door. They knock. From inside the hovel a little man's voice is heard. If Mel Brooks' Year Old Man was really old, he'd resemble this guy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (off-screen) Go away! Inigo pounds again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (opening a small window in the door) What? What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you the Miracle Max who worked for the King all those years?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The King's stinking son fired me. And thank you so much for bringing up such a painful subject. While you're at it, why don't you give me a nice paper cut and pour lemon juice on it? We're closed! He shuts the window. They rap on the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (opening the window) Beat it or I'll call the Brute Squad.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm on the Brute Squad.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (looking at the Giant) You are the Brute Squad.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, I'm retired. And besides, why would you want someone the King's stinking son fired? I might kill whoever you wanted me to miracle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's already dead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (for the first time, interested) He is, eh? I'll take a look. Bring him in. He unlocks the door and lets them in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've seen worse. He studies Westley a moment, checking here, checking there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sir. Sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hah?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're really in a terrible rush.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (He takes nothing from nobody) Don't rush me, sonny. You rush a miracle man, you get rotten miracles. You got money?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sixty-five.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sheesh! I never worked for so little, except once, and that was a very noble cause. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is noble, sir. (pointing to Westley, remorseful) His wife is crippled. His children are on the brink of starvation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you a rotten liar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I need him to help avenge my father, murdered these twenty years.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your first story was better. (looking around) Where's that bellows? (spots it) He probably owes you money, huh? Well, I'll ask him. He goes to get a huge bellows.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (stupefied) He's dead. He can't talk.
direction.name: direction

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It never happened.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But it did. I was there. This old man said, "Man and wife."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you say, "I do"?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, no, we sort of skipped that part.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then you're not married -- if you didn't say it, you didn't do it (a pause)
direction.name: direction

result.heading: I WANT MY FATHER BACK, YOU SON- OFA-BITCH

dialogue.raw_text: : INIGO staring at Rugen. And now Inigo does something we have never seen him do before: he smiles. HOLD FOR JUST A MOMENT on Inigo smiling, then -- CUT TO: INSIDE THE HONEYMOON SUITE WESTLEY lies as before, not a muscle has moved, his head is still on the headboard, Yellin's sword at his side. Buttercup is alongside the bed; her eyes never leave his face.

direction.raw_text: wouldn't you agree, Your Highness?

direction.raw_text: A technicality that will shortly be remedied. But first things first. To the death.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. (a little pause) To the pain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (about to charge, stops short) I don't think I'm quite familiar with that phrase.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll explain. And I'll use small words so that you'll be sure to understand, you wart-hog-faced buffoon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That may be the first time in my life a man has dared insult me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . WESTLEY lying there comfortably, his words quiet at first.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It won't be the last. To the pain means the first thing you lose will be your feet, below the ankles, then your hands at the wrists, next your nose.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: and then my tongue, I suppose. I killed you too quickly the last time, a mistake I don't mean to duplicate tonight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wasn't finished -- the next thing you lose will be your left eye, followed by your right -- HUMPERDINCK (takes step forward)
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: : HUMPERDINCK entering the room, staring at them. He pulls out his sword.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : HUMPERDINCK gripping his sword, watching.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: and then my ears, I understand. Let's get on with it
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wrong! Your ears you keep, and I'll tell you why -- CUT TO: HUMPERDINCK And now he stops, and the look that was in his eyes at the wedding, that look of fear, is starting to return.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: so that every shriek of every child at seeing your hideousness will be yours to cherish -- every babe that weeps at your approach, every woman who cries out, "Dear God, what is that thing?" will echo in your perfect ears. (MORE) ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That is what "to the pain" means. It means I leave you in anguish, wallowing in freakish misery forever.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think you're bluffing -- CUT TO: WESTLEY lying there, staring at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's possible, pig -- I might be bluffing -- it's conceivable, you miserable vomitous mass, that I'm only lying here because I lack the strength to stand -- then again, perhaps I have the strength after all. And now, slowly, Westley begins to move. His body turns, his feet go to the floor, he starts to stand -- CUT TO: HUMPERDINCK staring, eyes wide.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (slow and determined)

direction.raw_text: Tie him up. Make it as tight as you like. And as she sets to work -- CUT TO: INIGO entering, looking around.

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I thought he was with you.

direction.raw_text: No.

direction.raw_text: . HUMPERDINCK and now be starts wrestling mightily with his bonds.

direction.raw_text: (staring at the Prince) Shall I dispatch him for you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (considers this, then) Thank you, but no -- whatever happens to us, I want him to live a long life alone with his cowardice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (off-screen) Inigo! Inigo, where are you? They look at each other, then move to the balcony, and
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah, there you are. Inigo, I saw the Prince's stables, and there they were, four white horses. And I thought, there are four of us, if we ever find the lad -- hello, lad -- so I took them with me, in case we ever bumped into each other. (considers things a moment) I guess we just did.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't worry -- I won't let it go to my head. And as he holds out his great arms--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know, it's very strange -- I have been in the revenge business so long, now that it's over, I don't know what to do with the rest of my life.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (as Inigo gets him ready for his jump) Have you ever considered piracy? You'd make a wonderful Dread Pirate Roberts. Now from that -- CUT TO: THE FOUR GLORIOUS WHITE HORSES WITH THEIR FOUR RIDERS triumphantly racing through the night -- CUT TO: BUTTERCUP AND WESTLEY and at last their trials are done. They stop.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (off-screen) They rode to freedom. And as dawn arose, Westley and Buttercup knew they were safe. A wave of love swept over them. And as they reached for each other... ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

direction.raw_text: . As Buttercup and Westley begin their ultimate kiss -- CUT TO: THE KID'S BEDROOM The Grandfather stops reading.

direction.raw_text: (off-screen) Since the invention of the kiss, there have been five kisses that were rated the most passionate, the most pure. This one left them all behind. The end.
